whatIs.title: What is Microsoft Tenant?
whatIs.description: A Microsoft tenant is a dedicated instance of Azure AD that an organization receives when it signs up for Microsoft cloud services. It contains user accounts and configuration for Microsoft 365 or Azure services.

secureAccess.description: Your digital key that provides secure and controlled access to Microsoft services.
